00010 
00011 #include "Cell.h"
00012 #include <mcMd/chemistry/Atom.h>
00013 
00014 namespace McMd
00015 {
00016 
00017    using namespace Util;
00018 
00019    /* 
00020    * Default constructor, creates an empty Cell.
00021    */
00022    Cell::Cell() 
00023    {  clear();}
00024    
00025    /* 
00026    * Reset Cell to empty state.
00027    */
00028    void Cell::clear() 
00029    {
00030       nAtomCell_     = 0;
00031       firstEmptyPos_ = 0;
00032       firstClearPos_ = 0;
00033       for (int j = 0; j < MaxAtomCell; ++j) {
00034          atoms_[j] = 0;
00035       }
00036    }
00037    
00038    
00039    /* 
00040    * Check validity of Cell data members.
00041    */
00042    bool Cell::isValid(const Array<CellTag> &cellTags, int nAtom, int icell) 
00043    const
00044    {
00045       int jp, atomId, nAtomCellTest;
00046       nAtomCellTest=0;
00047       for (jp=0; jp < Cell::MaxAtomCell; ++jp) {
00048          if (atoms_[jp] != 0) {
00049             atomId = atoms_[jp]->id();
00050             ++nAtomCellTest;
00051             if (cellTags[atomId].cellId != icell) {
00052                UTIL_THROW("Value in CellTag.cellId inconsistent with icell");
00053             }
00054             if (cellTags[atomId].cellPos != jp) {
00055           std::cout << "atomId                   =" << atomId << std::endl;
00056           std::cout << "cellTags[atomId].cellPos =" 
00057                << cellTags[atomId].cellPos << std::endl;
00058           std::cout << "index jp in Cell         = " <<  jp << std::endl;
00059                UTIL_THROW(
00060                      "Value in CellTag.cellPos inconsistent with Cell.atoms_");
00061             }
00062             if (jp >= firstClearPos_) {
00063                UTIL_THROW("Value atoms_[i] >=0 for i >= firstClearPos_");
00064             }
00065          } else {
00066             if (jp < firstEmptyPos_) {
00067                UTIL_THROW("Value atoms_[i] < 0 for i < firstEmptyPos_");
00068             }
00069          }
00070       }
00071       if (firstClearPos_ > 0 && atoms_[firstClearPos_-1] < 0) {
00072          UTIL_THROW("Error: firstClearPos_: atoms_[firstClearPos_-1] < 0");
00073       }
00074       if (nAtomCellTest != nAtomCell_) {
00075          UTIL_THROW("Number of atoms in cell != nAtomCell_");
00076       }
00077       return true;
00078    }
00079 
00080 } 
00081 #endif
